title: Software Engineer - Solana at Rain
description: Rain is hiring a Software Engineer for Solana development. Salary range: $140k - $240k. Location: New York / Remote.

title: Crypto Production Engineer at Jumpcrypto
description: Jumpcrypto is seeking a Crypto Production Engineer. Salary range: $150k - $200k. Remote.

title: Rust Developer at 1010 trading
description: 1010 trading is looking for a Rust Developer for EVM Systems & Trading Infrastructure. Remote.

title: TRM Labs reaches unicorn status with $70M Series C
description: Blockchain intelligence firm TRM Labs has achieved unicorn status after raising $70 million in a Series C funding round to expand its compliance and risk management tools.

title: Jupiter secures $35M strategic raise for Solana DeFi
description: Jupiter, a leading aggregator on Solana, has secured $35 million in strategic funding to further enhance its DeFi infrastructure and ecosystem growth.

title: IoTeX ioTube bridge hacked for $4.4M
description: The IoTeX ioTube cross-chain bridge was exploited for approximately $4.4 million due to a compromised private key used for a malicious contract upgrade.
